alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 2:54PM CDT until June 17 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CONCORDIA PARISH...SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN AND SOUTHERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Woodville, or 22 miles north of Jackson, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Kingston, Garden City, Sibley and Deer Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
